verses.text: Now it came to pass in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* when the \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* \w ruled|strong="H8199"\w*, that there was a \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*. And a certain \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Beth-lehem-judah|strong="H1035"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* in the \w country|strong="H7704"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, he, and his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, and his \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.\f + \fr 1.1 \ft ruled: Heb. judged\f*

And the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add was\add* \w Elimelech|strong="H0458"\w*, and the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w*, and the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of his \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w Mahlon|strong="H4248"\w* and \w Chilion|strong="H3630"\w*, \w Ephrathites|strong="H0673"\w* of \w Beth-lehem-judah|strong="H1035"\w*. And they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w country|strong="H7704"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and continued there.\f + \fr 1.2 \ft continued: Heb. were\f*

And \w Elimelech|strong="H0458"\w* \w Naomi’s|strong="H5281"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*; and she was \w left|strong="H7604"\w*, and her \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.

And they \w took|strong="H5375"\w* them \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* of the \w women|strong="H0802"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4125"\w*; the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \add was\add* \w Orpah|strong="H6204"\w*, and the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w*: and they \w dwelled|strong="H3427"\w* there about \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

And \w Mahlon|strong="H4248"\w* and \w Chilion|strong="H3630"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* also \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them; and the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* was \w left|strong="H7604"\w* of her \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H3206"\w* and her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*.

¶ Then she \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* with her daughters in \w law|strong="H3618"\w*, that she might \w return|strong="H7725"\w* from the \w country|strong="H7704"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*: for she had \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* in the \w country|strong="H7704"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* how that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w visited|strong="H6485"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* in \w giving|strong="H5414"\w* them \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.

Wherefore she went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where she was, and her \w two|strong="H8147"\w* daughters in \w law|strong="H3618"\w* with her; and they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* on the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* to \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

And \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her \w two|strong="H8147"\w* daughters in \w law|strong="H3618"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w each|strong="H0802"\w* to her \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* \w kindly|strong="H2617"\w* with you, as ye have \w dealt|strong="H6213"\w* with the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, and with me.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* you that ye may \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w rest|strong="H4496"\w*, \w each|strong="H0802"\w* \add of you\add* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*. Then she \w kissed|strong="H5401"\w* them; and they lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* their \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*.
And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, Surely we will \w return|strong="H7725"\w* with thee unto thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Turn \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, my \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*: why will ye \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with me? \add are\add* there yet \add any more\add* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* in my \w womb|strong="H4578"\w*, that they may be your \w husbands|strong="H0582"\w*?

Turn \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, my \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \add your way;\add* for I am too \w old|strong="H2204"\w* to have an \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*. If I should \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w*, \add if\add* I should have an \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* also to \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and should also \w bear|strong="H3205"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*;\f + \fr 1.12 \ft should have…: or were with an husband\f*

Would ye \w tarry|strong="H7663"\w* for \w them|strong="H3860"\w* till they were \w grown|strong="H1431"\w*? would ye \w stay|strong="H5702"\w* for \w them|strong="H3860"\w* from having \w husbands|strong="H0376"\w*? nay, my \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*; for it \w grieveth|strong="H4843"\w* me \w much|strong="H3966"\w* for your sakes that the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* is gone \w out|strong="H3318"\w* against me.\f + \fr 1.13 \ft tarry: Heb. hope\f*\f + \fr 1.13 \ft it grieveth…: Heb. I have much bitterness\f*

And they lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* their \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and wept \w again|strong="H1058"\w*: and \w Orpah|strong="H6204"\w* \w kissed|strong="H5401"\w* her mother in \w law|strong="H2545"\w*; but \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* \w clave|strong="H1692"\w* unto her.

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, thy sister in \w law|strong="H2994"\w* is gone \w back|strong="H7725"\w* unto her \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and unto her \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*: \w return|strong="H7725"\w* thou \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thy sister in \w law|strong="H2994"\w*.

And \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Intreat|strong="H6293"\w* me not to \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* thee, \add or\add* to \w return|strong="H7725"\w* from following \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thee: for whither thou \w goest|strong="H3212"\w*, I will \w go|strong="H3212"\w*; and where thou \w lodgest|strong="H3885"\w*, I will \w lodge|strong="H3885"\w*: thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add shall be\add* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*:\f + \fr 1.16 \ft Intreat…: or, Be not against me\f*

Where thou \w diest|strong="H4191"\w*, will I \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, and there will I be \w buried|strong="H6912"\w*: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* so to me, and \w more|strong="H3254"\w* also, \add if ought\add* but \w death|strong="H4194"\w* \w part|strong="H6504"\w* thee and me.

When she \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that she was stedfastly \w minded|strong="H0553"\w* to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with her, then she \w left|strong="H2308"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* unto her.\f + \fr 1.18 \ft was…: Heb. strengthened herself\f*

¶ So they \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* until they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*. And it came to pass, when they were \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*, that all the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* was \w moved|strong="H1949"\w* about them, and they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Is\add* this \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w*?

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Call|strong="H7121"\w* me not \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w*, \w call|strong="H7121"\w* me \w Mara|strong="H4755"\w*: for the \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* hath dealt \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w bitterly|strong="H4843"\w* with me.\f + \fr 1.20 \ft Naomi: that is, Pleasant\f*\f + \fr 1.20 \ft Mara: that is, Bitter\f*

I went \w out|strong="H1980"\w* \w full|strong="H4392"\w*, and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath brought me home \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w empty|strong="H7387"\w*: why \add then\add* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* ye me \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w*, seeing the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w testified|strong="H6030"\w* against me, and the \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* hath \w afflicted|strong="H7489"\w* me?

So \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* the \w Moabitess|strong="H4125"\w*, her daughter in \w law|strong="H3618"\w*, with her, which \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* out of the \w country|strong="H7704"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*: and they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w* in the \w beginning|strong="H8462"\w* of \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*.
